text: I know it’s just me posting a bunch in here but this has been such a great learning experience. I killed the repo from yesterday and built a new one that anyone can use. It’s the standard HubSpot CMS boilerplate + Gulp + Webpack + SCSS + Babel. Feedback is still very much appreciated: <https://github.com/emptypockets-dev/hubpack-with-gulp>

awesome. i built a similar framework a while back, but i got pulled onto rebuilding our own agency website and couldn’t take all the “kludgy” factors out of it. and then since i used it for that, after how many 70 hour weeks, i got so sick of the whole thing and said enough.
I don't use HubSpot CMS boilerplate or Gulp or Webpack or SCSS or Babel. :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing: But this is really cool, nice work :boom:
